name: Construction Town Play Set for Kids
name_original: Construction Town Play Set for Kids
description:
Construction Town Play Set for Kids

Fantasic app for kids who love to play with toy cars and trucks, you can move all vehicle as well as traffic lights, cones, stop signs etc..

Plus it has 28 vehicle sound effects and a memory matching game

Great to keep kids quiet for hours and has the bonus of being FREE

Produced by SlinkyApps.com please check out our other Kids apps

http://www.SlinkyApps.com
